page.title: 05Computers at Medstead School
page.content:
Computers at Medstead School are used for seven purposes. These are
a) Word processing b) Simulations c) Logo d) Control Technology e) Database work f) School administration.
All children at Medstead are encouraged to see computers as a tool to assist in learning rather than as an end to itself. This is part of a move within the school to encourage children to be independent learners.
We are educating children for the Needs of the Future, to equip them for a changing society, and to prepare them for a future we cannot describe.
